ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:11:06 [Issue ID 4000-140777] urn:comicvine:4000-140777
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Savage Tales from DYNAMITE ENTERTAINMENT continue in issue #8! This month, Red Sonja and Quatermain continue! Plus: the return of the Hunter from the pages of Red Sonja and the return of Savage Tales Atlantis!
Red Sonja (part 2) By Vito Delsante and Lui Antonio: the conclusion of an all-new Red Sonja short!
Quartermain (Part 2) By Luke Lieberman, Matt (Entourage) Wolpert and Diego Bernard: The early adventures of the world-s greatest explorer continue to unfold.
The Trials of Osin (Part 1) by Luke Lieberman and Fabiano Neves: From the pages of Red Sonja come the untold trials of Osin, bridging the gap from the end of the Gath storyline and the bold new direction begun in Red Sonja #35!
Battle For Atlantis (Part 1) By Leah Moore, John Reppion and Pablo Marcos: the fan-favorite Savage Tales series returns with an all-new sequel serial!
All the action and excitement (and sex and violence) under one incredible cover by Arthur Suydam!
